display_long_description:
Jump into the high-octane world of "Turbo Taxi Rush," the VR experience that puts you behind the wheel of a turbo-charged taxi in a bustling urban landscape. This game combines speed, strategy, and skill as you navigate through crowded city streets, pick up passengers in desperate need of a lift, and rush to get them to their destinations on time. With obstacles to dodge, unpredictable traffic, and the constant pressure of the ticking clock, every ride is a new adventure..

Featuring responsive VR controls, "Turbo Taxi Rush" brings an unmatched level of immersion, allowing you to feel every twist, turn, and rush as you dodge obstacles and maneuver through challenging routes. Upgrade your taxi, enhance your driving skills, and unlock new areas and routes as you progress. Whether you're an experienced driver or a newcomer to VR racing, "Turbo Taxi Rush" will keep you on the edge of your seat. So grab the wheel, hit the gas, and see if you can handle the speed and intensity of the ultimate taxi race!
